ygData.msgSnippet: I hope I didn t offend anyone by creating a separate group to work on a tournament, but that s the easiest way I can come up with to keep people from getting

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

I hope I didn't offend anyone by creating a separate group to work on 
a tournament, but that's the easiest way I can come up with to keep 
people from getting bored.  The only time I plan on closing off 
access to archives of the other group is when we start 
selecting/modifying scenarios.
